11221.content:
It was a long and tough battle to the death but with one final strike to the neck, the mighty dragon collapsed and lay defeated on the cold stone floor. You were the victor and was the only man throughout the land to have done so. When you dropped your sword, the room in the ruins fell silent for the first time since you entered and the was sun rising over the mountains. A glorious sight indeed. You were not done with your quest yet, however. As soon as you had rested a bit the , you decided to locate the tallest tower. If the rumors surrounding the dragon were correct then word of a beautiful Princess may have been true also.

It did not take long to find the stairs and begin your climb. They were large steps and many of them too so you needed to take a break every now and then to prevent dying of exhaustion. As you rose near the top of the tower, you caught your breath on something quite foul, unpleasant like something was rotting or died so you hoped you were not too late to save the princess. With your mouth and nose covered with your hand, you finally reached the top and slowly opened the door. The sight of a well-decorated and clean room was ruined by the odor of what could be described as lingering sweat and feet. Instead of finding a body, you found the room empty. Perhaps the princess was already rescued or she managed to escape. You looked about for a few seconds, defeated before almost closing the door.

"Brave Knight?"

You were startled by a soft feminine voice that originated from behind a curtain. Still with your hand firm over your mouth, you opened the door more and could see the face of a beautiful slender woman who entered the room from a hidden second room of some sort. She was in a green, patterned dress and had red hair tied in a bun. She sat on the bed and was watching you, a little confused.

"I just had a bath so I apologize for not being present, so tell me brave Knight, since you are here, you must have defeated the dragon, am I right?"

"I have indeed your highness, take a look" You gesture to the window. As she lept from the bed and perched to the window ledge behind her, you saw the room and realized something, If her room was clean and she just had a bath then why does the room still smell so bad.

"Sir Knight this is wonderful I can finally be freed from this prison...may I see your face? I wish to reward you with a kiss" She raced toward you so she was almost directly in the kissing distance. "Please please please!"

You had uncovered your face for a second but only to catch the putrid smell of her bad breath as she talked. It was if she hadn't cleaned her teeth in weeks or months even but her teeth looked so...perfect. You covered right away which only angered the princess.

"But brave Knight, whatever is the matter?"

{Originally written by fartlover24 on Princess Fiona Interactive/Torture}

You grumble to yourself as you head out into the swamp. It is you're turn on gathering duty for the fairy hive to which you belong. You detest gathering duty, it always meant a whole day of being outside, ruffling through plants and dirt to find resources all alone. You continued grumbling as you headed further into the swamp, not realizing that you had strayed from the normal path till suddenly you ran into a shack in the middle of the swamp.



At first you were afraid as you could be seen or caught by humans here, then you realized that you could just steal some supplies from the shack then take the rest of the day off... It was a risky plan, but you were really lazy and the pros seemed to outweigh the cons. You smile to yourself as you fluttered over to an open window of the shack and peered in. The coast was clear, so you quickly flew in and began to load your bag with the fruits available. There were many weird ingredients lying around, such as eyes and frogs but there were also fruits, so you though nothing of it and hurried along with your work.



As soon as you filled your bag, you applauded yourself on how easy that was then flew towards the open window smiling broadly. Suddenly as large glass cylinder swept around you and you were caught. You should not have let your guard down, you sulked to yourself as the jar was sealed brought up to the beaming face of an ogress.

"Oooh, a fairy," She exclaimed, still smiling. "Haven't caught one of those in a while."

You suddenly shudder in fear and fall to your knees begging "Please mam, don't eat me, I'll do anything you want just please let me free!"

"Don't worry little one, I'm not going to eat you," She says kindly, and you exhale a sigh of relief. "Though you may grow to wish that I had." She adds, grinning evilly.

Your curiosity piques at her mention, though you remain glad that she was not going to eat you. She then puts the glass jar on the table and begins to walk away.

"I'm Fiona by the way." She adds offhand as she walks away.

Well, you where trapped for the time being but it seemed that your captor was kind enough. So you began to relax as she went about her daily routine and you slowly fell asleep.



You are suddenly awakened by the jar being lifted an unsealed, even though you are still groggy you shoot towards the exit, hopes of freedom in your heart. But alas they are short lived as you bump into something round and soft, then fall back to the bottom of the jar and look up at what blocked your escape.

"That tickled!" Fiona giggled, as you stare upon the two massive, green orbs blocking your escape and your jaw drops.

"Feel free to keep tickling my bum with your wings if you want," She giggles. "I may go a little easier on you while I'm relieving myself."

"Relieving?" You question and as if in response her butt lets out a huge "PHRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRT!" and fills the jar with noxious gas.

Your eyes tear up and you begin to choke on her gas as she sighs in relief.

"Haaaaaaaa, that felt amazing." she giggled.

For anyone who has a request that they'd like to give me, there are some rules in place for them.

1. I'll only be writing stories. My artistic skills are horrible.

2. Said stories will only be around 2,000-5,000 characters long. This goes for Deviantart, Aryion.com, Fanfiction.net, and Writing.com. I'll need at least three days to completely one story. Sorry, but my writing process is very slow. This character limit also applies to any story that I am requested to write on my interactives.

3. I'll typically just do stories centered around giantism, burping, and/or eating, so keep that in mind if you decide to send me requests.

4. I'll write fanfiction involving characters from already established fiction (i.e. Certain Western Animation, Films, Comics, Video Games, Anime/Manga, etc.) & about anyone's original character, just characters that exist in fictional works.

5. I'll only write about certain fictional works that I'm well versed in, so if I'm not familiar enough with the work that you want me to use, then I'll have to deny your request.

6. I reserve the right to deny any request I choose, so hope that I like your ideas enough to use them.

7. I'll only be taking one request at a time, so if I decide to take a request from one person, then everyone else waits until I complete the work that I'm already doing, regardless of what site I get it from. (i.e. This means that if I take a request from someone on Deviantart or Writing.com or Aryion.com or Fanfiction.net, then I will NOT accept another from anyone else on Deviantart or Writing.com or Aryion.com or Fanfiction.net or any other website until the current one is completed.)

8. Anyone who requests me to write something must write something for me in return. This goes for every site that I am a part of.

Will Do / Won't Do
I will do any stories involving giantesses, females burping/belching, eating, and/or performing oral vore. I will also do farting if I feel like it. I won't do anything involving giants, males burping/belching, eating, and/or performing oral vore. I also won't do any other kind of vore besides oral. I won't do anything involving sex or featuring characters below eighteen engaging in sexual activities. I also won't do expansion of any body part besides bellies. I won't do videos and/or pictures because my artistic skills are horrible.

Pricing
None. I don't know how to send or receive money.

These are the rules that I've set up and I expect everyone to follow them.

enjoy and PLEASE Add!
